message:
Link Datacenter is now hiring “Senior Solution Developer”

“Senior Solution Developer” with below requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent discipline
Deep knowledge of the .NET 3.5/4.0 Framework, including Visual Studio 2010, C#.NET, ASP.NET, ASMX , WCF Web Services, Entity Framework , Windows WF , and T-SQL 
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) , design patterns and computer science foundations, such as memory management and low-level algorithm performance.
Knowledge of SharePoint or CRM is a huge plus.
Application Development/Support and Maintenance
Architecture/Design
4+ years of work experience in software development discipline

If you are interested or do you know anyone to recommend send the resume to vacancyaf4u@gmail.com, and please and mention the job title in the email subject
